review: Not impressed! I got this a few days ago and was not able to use it on 2 of the 4 TV's I have ( one a fairly new Toshiba) I've gone ahead and checked all the troubleshooting steps and of course 1 TV is the one I really wanted to use this on.The Only reason I'm giving it two stars is that I've been able to use it on one TV. I really like the menus and it's got potential just not ready for prime time I guess!
author: J J Antonetti

review: Works great for what it does.  I have been using a Chromecast and prefer casting my laptop to the TV.  The Fire Stick is not able to do this.  I you don't mind another remote and searching with it, then this device is for you.  I prefer browsing with my mouse and laptop and then casting.It does provide a better picture quality for Prime programming.I had the Fire tablet.  I quit using it because I didn't like the restrictive Amazon software and the inability to load Google Pay apps.
